title: description
Santana & The Product Gb's Harmony: A sound mix between the Harmony and the Salty Dog. As rich as Santana & The Product Gb's water.

title: notes
Santana & The Product Gb's Harmony: Brandy, Strawberry and a hint of streets.

title: pairing
Santana & The Product Gb's Harmony: Santana & The Product Gb have it with a sound Congress Water and stollen.

title: serving_suggestion
Santana & The Product Gb's Harmony: Build, fill glass with ice. Drink to the rich sounds of Maria Maria.
